com.nexmo.client.applications

Class ApplicationClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.client.applications.ApplicationClient

  • public class ApplicationClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A client for talking to the Nexmo Number Applications API. The standard way to obtain an instance of this class is to use NexmoClient.getApplicationClient().

    • Method Detail

      • createApplication

        public ApplicationDetails createApplication(CreateApplicationRequest request)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            NexmoClientException
        Create a new Application.
        Parameters:
        request - A CreateApplicationRequest describing the application to be created.
        Returns:
        An ApplicationDetails object describing the newly created application, including generated private and public keys.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        NexmoClientException

      • updateApplication

        public ApplicationDetails updateApplication(UpdateApplicationRequest request)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            NexmoClientException
        Update an existing application with the provided details.
        Parameters:
        request - An UpdateApplicationRequest describing the new application details.
        Returns:
        An ApplicationDetails object describing the newly modified application.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        NexmoClientException

      • listApplications

        public ListApplicationsResponse listApplications(ListApplicationsRequest request)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 NexmoClientException
        List the applications associated with the authenticated account. By default returns the first page of application objects.
        Parameters:
        request - A ListApplicationsRequest object containing the required paging information.
        Returns:
        A ListApplicationsResponse, which is an Iterator of ApplicationDetails objects.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        NexmoClientException

      • getApplication

        public ApplicationDetails getApplication(java.lang.String applicationId)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         NexmoClientException
        Obtain the details of an existing application.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The id of the application
        Returns:
        An ApplicationDetails object describing the requested application.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        NexmoClientException

      • deleteApplication

        public void deleteApplication(java.lang.String applicationId)
                       throws java.io.IOException,
                              NexmoClientException
        Delete an application.
        Parameters:
        applicationId - The ID of the application to be deleted.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        NexmoClientException
